attributes.additional_details: To prevent COVID-19 from spreading, while ensuring that it does not affect the learning process.
attributes.background: Universities should implement online teaching, eliminate the requirement to force full-time students into offline classrooms, and change the offline crowd test for courses to thesis evaluation.

rejection.details:
Decisions about how to run classes are a matter for individual educational institutions.

We have published a petition calling for the Government to close universities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
